## Carry Recipe
_Christina’s Ruckless – Base Size Minus 1 – Traditional Sling Pass + Reinforcing Pass + Cross Pass_

- Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back
- Under arm tail bunched across chest over other tail and across baby for a Reinforced Pass
- The hanging tail flips over opposite shoulder for a Cross Pass
- Tie in front & spread passes
